message: ...And then, we returned to the real world.
But my attempt to use Scrap had failed, and Koujaku... he...
He had lost his mind.

After that, Koujaku was captured by Toue's men and imprisoned underneath Platinum Jail.

Left to his own devices, he would no doubt have killed everyone in sight.
How did this happen?

...I know the answer.<k>
It was all my fault.
If I hadn't failed...
If I'd just...
I feel my will growing weaker. Something else is rising in its place, another will, mouth wide to swallow me whole.
I recognize it. It's the voice that's always whispered in my ear.
"Destroy... Destroy..."
I don't have the strength to fight him anymore.
Slowly... <K>Slowly...
I slip into darkness.
What happened to Koujaku was my fault.
...Heh. That's what the old me thought.
But that's not me anymore.
Now―there's a new me.
I guess you could say I'm Aoba's "id."
I was always held in check by his "ego," but the more Aoba used my power... the more he used Scrap, the stronger I became.
And in the end, I consumed him, just like Ryuuhou's tattoo consumed Koujaku.
After Scrap failed and Aoba lost the will to resist, it was finally my time to surface.
I have but one wish.
To destroy.
Destroy. Destroy. I don't care what.
I want only to destroy―<K>everything.
Take Koujaku. The tattoo devoured his soul, but I think that was for the best.
There's nothing holding him back now. He's a creature of pure instinct.
Just like me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ahahahahaha!!!"
